Game Features:

* Customize your experience with game options, custom sound effects and themes.
* iPad Pro and iPhone X support.

How to score:
* Single, double or triple tap a dart button to score a single, double or triple respectively, or long press a dart button to score.
* Tap the miss button to record a miss.
* Tap the next (forward arrow) button to move to the next players turn.
* Tap the undo (back arrow) button to undo the last throw.
* Tap the reset button to restart the current game.
* Or, you can tap and hold the microphone button to speak your score. For example, you can say things like "Double 19, Triple 16, Miss", then release the microphone button to apply the score.

Our  Performance Test app uses this data to provide you with acceleration, deceleration and VMAX information for your vehicle previously only available to professional Racelogic VBOX users.
 
You can quickly and accurately measure your 0-60 acceleration time, turn your test track into a dragstrip and measure your 1/4 mile time and trap speed. Different modes allow you to measure your braking performance and zero to zero times, all using the same VBOX technology used by all the major motor manufacturers and car magazines around the world.

All of the apps functionality is available when you are connected via Bluetooth to an iOS device running iOS 7.0 or later.  If you are not connected to a VBOX Sport the app will launch in demo mode to allow you to sample the features.

For more information on the VBOX Sport from Racelogic and to find details of your local dealer please visit www.vboxmotorsport.co.uk
